amendment.description: To support the health needs of our veterans and military personnel and reduce the deficit by making tax rates fairer for all Americans.

action.text: Amendment SA 2735 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 2707.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2735.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2735 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 7.
Amendment SA 2735 ruled out of order by the chair.
